title: Gamer Stack
description: Created a fully functioning stack data structure in C++ with all the bells and whistles.

title: Dice incorporated
description: Made a game w/ a friend.

title: DSC80 TF-IDF example project
description: basically made an llm. give me money please.

title: I HATE SPOTIFY
description: I got really fed up w/ spotify so I created my own software that automatically found, entered, and played mp3 files on my system. You would give it a file path to a folder, and it would load every folder and song in there, with each folder being its own playlist

title: Fishing man simulator
description: A game where fish scrolled from left to right on the screen. Unfinished.

title: Synthesizer in Processing
description: Little thing I had to for AP CSP, where we had to make the computer make noises based on what letter on our keyboard we pressed.

title: Text Game
description: I mustve made 100 of these when I was younger. I would take a python script and do branching if/else statements to create a game, where your choices were to basically kill monsters. I should make another one of those, but knowing what I know now and on the web. That would be cool.

title: DSC 20 Final Project
description: Did a very large computer vision project for the final project for DSC 20. very cool.

title: Cogs 9 final project
description: Did a cool analysis of a kaggle data set involving people's knowledge of food of the world.

title: Text processor for visual novel
description: Im working on a game, writer handed me a 125 page script and wanted me to make a visual novel segment about it. I wasn't formatting that massive json file by hand, so I set up a script to do most of it for me. Pretty cool.

title: My Private Fighting Game Notes
description: I have notes on every single character in Under Night In Birth II [Sys-celes], which is 26 that arent mine. Lots of effort and learning about every character has helped me improve greatly, and will only help more.

title: Bike watch
description: I have notes on every single character in Under Night In Birth II [Sys-celes], which is 26 that arent mine. Lots of effort and learning about every character has helped me improve greatly, and will only help more.
